alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Emmons; Logan; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:31AM CST until December 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Burleigh, Emmons, Logan, and McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Use caution while outdoors. Wear appropriate winter clothing.
